BOOST_COMP compiler macros

BOOST_COMP_BORLAND

Borland C++ compiler. Version number available as major, minor, and patch.

Symbol

Version

__BORLANDC__

detection

__CODEGEARC__

detection

__BORLANDC__

V.R.P

__CODEGEARC__

V.R.P

Version

detection

__clang_major__, __clang_minor__, __clang_patchlevel__

V.R.P
